alert.note: Alert for Logan; Simpson; Warren (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 05 at 4:18PM EDT by NWS Louisville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Logan, central Simpson and southwestern Warren Counties through 345 PM CDT... At 318 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles southeast of Russellville, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of southwestern Warren, central Logan and central Simpson Counties, including the following locations... Neosheo, Dennis, Rich Pond, Rockfield, Auburn, South Union, Woodburn, Salmons, Schochoh and Middleton. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM CDT for south central Kentucky.
